Kinderbear Families!
We are so excited to have you as part of our Kinderbear community. We have been anxiously waiting for you and preparing for our upcoming school year. While school may look a little different this year we are still going to learn so much and have a great time doing it!

Our Kindergarten team is made up of Regan Keelty and Sarah Farrar. We both worked together for a decade beginning our teaching careers in preschool classrooms. We have been teaching kindergarten together for 7 years. We both live locally and have children of our own. We are avid readers, gardeners, shoppers, and enjoy each other's company in and out of school.

As with every year we are planning for this school year as a team and we consider every kindergarten student part of our Kinderbear community. After our meetings on Monday, August 31st, and as more details emerge about learning formats we will be reaching out to share more details with you. We appreciate your patience during this complicated planning process.

We are Pawsitive it will be a Beary 🐻 good year!

💚 Ms. Regan & Ms.Sarah

Sheldon Parents, this is so worth the watch! Worried about your kids during this pandemic? Thinking about what the fall might look like? Take an hour and tune in here. Not only does Dr. Joelle van Lent remind us that we do not have to be perfect parents to our kids (and actually, modeling making mistakes and pushing through is more valuable) she helps to define what it means to build resilient kids.

"All the research shows that you can improve resiliency in a situation or a person's life." It is not "too late."

#perfectionisnotthegoal #SheldonStrong #parentpartners #allstressisnottoxicstress

St. Albans Rotary Ski Bus

Do you know a young person who is ready for skiing and riding this winter or would like to learn to ski or ride? Join the St. Albans Rotary Ski Bus! The bus runs for 10 Saturdays starting the first Saturday in January to Smugglers Notch. The program is for students age 10 through high school seniors.

Pick up and return times are:

Swanton - Departs at 7:15 am - Arrives at 5:15 pm. (126 Grand Avenue)

SATEC - Departs at 8 am - Arrives at 5:00 pm.

NEW LOCATION THIS YEAR! BFA Fairfax - Departs at 8:30 am - Arrives at 4:30 pm.

Students must register online by Thursdays at noon before each Saturday: http://www.stalbansrotaryclub.com. Individual Saturdays are $25, a season pass is $200 paid in advance online. Snowboard and ski lessons and rentals are free on non-holiday weeks!

Scholarships are available! Applications are available through the Warner Home Scholarship (http://www.warnerhomeforlittlewanderers.org/endowment.html).

Email for more information: sarotaryskibus@gmail.com
